name: The Blackness from the Stars
description:
The lighthouse must eat, or the light will fade away. Then the darkness will feast with your flesh. Survive until the arrival of the boat.

Explore and fetch the embers around the island, then feed them to the furnace inside the house. That will keep the light alive. 'Cause light is your only hope.

CONTROLS (Keyboard + Mouse)
MOVE - wasd
RUN - hold shift
CAMERA - mouse
JUMP - space
INTERACT/PICK UP/DROP - e
